overview: An odyssey of 22 unique Sacred Geometrical codes and original music tuned to A=432 Hz, the harmonic intonation of nature, 22: The Light Codes is a meditation tool that anyone can use to bring healing and peace to their lives. As you journey through Atlantis, the Cosmos, and the Himalayas, feel your tension slip away to be replaced by a calm connectedness to yourself and nature.
title: 22: The Light Codes
